new-haven.title: New Haven
new-haven.html:
Walled market town with cobblestone streets and a lively marketplace.

  • Inn: The Silver Tinker
  • Blacksmith: The Anvil & Ember

blackthorn-ruins.title: Blackthorn Ruins
blackthorn-ruins.html: Ancient amphitheater crumbling above the cliffs. Locals avoid it after dark.

pebble-bay.title: Pebble Bay
pebble-bay.html: Beautiful inlet bay with sandy shores on the south side of the island. Pebble Bay is the end of the river that connects to Lake Flourn

lake-florn.title: Lake Florn
lake-florn.html: At the base of the Blackthorn Mountains, surrounded by dark forest on the east and west, Lake Florn is the center of Thornreach. It home to many magical creatures.
